about_the_game:
Warning


The translation of the English version of this game is machine translation plus embellishment. Individual independent development has no money to find professional translators. If you mind, please buy carefully.

One night, Amelia was involved in a dispute, died in a car accident, and then strangely resurrected. Amelia woke up and found herself in a strange place. She needed to escape here as soon as possible.

Game play


Players control Amelia to solve many puzzles and fight with the gun in their hands.

After her death and rebirth, Amelia gained the ability to cross the two worlds. She needed the ability to solve various puzzles and escape there. In addition, there are two guns, pistols and shotguns in the main process of the game. In addition, you can get a submachine gun and another powerful shotgun by solving the two hidden puzzles of the branch line in the game.

How to play


Default key position
↑↓←→ - Move Z -Confirm / Interactive X - Menu / Cancel SHIFT - Dash

Q - Page up / Flashlight W - Page down / Ability

D C - ←Switch firearm→ V - Switch Melee X - Attack in battle mode

1 - Open items quickly 2 - Open equipment quickly

E - Use items quickly F - Replace magazine manually

About the game


It is the first real work developed independently by individuals. Theoretically, there should be many problems.
Amelia's resurrection game communication qq group: 904868165
Thanks to Beiji for helping to draw the logo of the cover title.

Poison reporting and accidental killing


If the game cannot run due to a virus report and accidental killing, be sure to close the anti-virus software before downloading and starting the game. If the startup program is killed by mistake, you can right-click the properties of the game in the Steam Library interface, and then click the local file to verify the integrity of the game file before starting the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 及以上
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
